  • Method Details

    • getAllCards

      @GetMapping("/getAllCards") @ResponseBody public List<Card> getAllCards()
      Return all the cards which are stored in the database
      Returns:
      all the cards in the database

    • getCardByCardId

      @GetMapping("/getCardByCardId/{cardId}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Card> getCardByCardId(@PathVariable("cardId") long cardId)
      Get a single card whose id matches the input cardId, if a card with the input id exists.
      Parameters:
      cardId - id of the card that is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The card that is requested using its ID. Return null if a card with the given id does not exist.

    • addCard

      @PostMapping("/addCard/{title}/{columnId}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Card> addCard(@PathVariable("title") String title, @PathVariable("columnId") Long columnId)
      Parameters:
      title - Of the card
      columnId - the columnId on which the card needs to be
      Returns:
      if successful, the method returns an ok

    • createSubtask

      @PostMapping("/addSubtask/{cardId}/{subtaskTitle}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Card> createSubtask(@PathVariable("cardId") long cardId, @PathVariable("subtaskTitle") String subtaskTitle)
      Creates a new subtask and associates it with the specified card.
      Parameters:
      cardId - the ID of the card to which the subtask should be added
      subtaskTitle - the subtask to be added to the card
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the updated Card object if the card was found, or a 404 Not Found response if the card was not found

    • editCardTitle

      @PutMapping("/editCardTitle/{cardId}/{title}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Card> editCardTitle(@PathVariable("cardId") long cardId, @PathVariable("title") String title)
      Change the title of a card, if it exists. Receive a message on the success of the edit
      Parameters:
      cardId - The ID of the card whose title should be changed
      title - Title which should replace the old title of the card
      Returns:
      receive a message indicating the title has change, if the card exists. If it doesn't, receive an appropriate response to the client.

    • editCardDescription

      @PutMapping("/editCardDescription/{cardId}/{description}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Card> editCardDescription(@PathVariable("cardId") long cardId, @PathVariable("description") String description)
      Change the description of a card, if it exists. Receive a message on the success of the edit
      Parameters:
      cardId - The ID of the card whose title should be changed
      description - Description which should replace the old title of the card
      Returns:
      receive a message indicating the description has change, if the card exists. If it doesn't, receive an appropriate response to the client.

    • editCardPosition

      @PutMapping("/editCardPosition/{cardId}/{newPosition}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Card> editCardPosition(@PathVariable("cardId") long cardId, @PathVariable("newPosition") int newPosition)
      Change a position of a Card in the Column it is in, and change the positions of other Cards in the Column which have been affected by the position change. Store all the position changes in the database
      Parameters:
      cardId - id of the Card whose position needs to be changed
      newPosition -
      Returns:
      Conformation that the positions of the Card and all other Cards have that been affected have been changed

    • deleteCard

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteCard/{cardId}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Card> deleteCard(@PathVariable("cardId") long cardId)
      Delete a card from the database and receive a conformation using the card's id, if the card exists.
      Parameters:
      cardId - id of the card that is to be deleted
      Returns:
      Returns a conformation message if the card is found and deleted. Else, receive an appropriate response to the client.

      Get all the subtasks from a card
      Parameters:
      cardId - id of the card to get the subtasks from
      Returns:

    • changeSubtaskPosition

      @PutMapping("/changeSubtaskPosition/{cardId}/{oldPos}/{newPos}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Card> changeSubtaskPosition(@PathVariable("cardId") long cardId, @PathVariable("oldPos") int oldPos, @PathVariable("newPos") int newPos)
      Changes the position of a subtask in a card
      Parameters:
      cardId - the card the subtask is in
      oldPos - the old position of the subtask
      newPos - the new position of the subtask
      Returns:
      the new card with updated subtask positions

      Deletes a subtask from the card
      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • updateCard

      @MessageMapping("/updateCard") @SendTo("/topic/updateCard") public Card updateCard(Card card)

      Parameters:
      card - the card to be updated
      Returns:
      the updated card
